17 //template class for simple functions (breifs in horiz_drive.cpp)
18 template <class T>
19 void constrain(T &value, T min, T max){
20  if(value > max){
21  value = max;
22  } else if(value < min){
23  value = min;
24  }
25 }
26 
27 template <class T>
28 T abs(T value){
29  if(value < 0)
30  value*=-1;
31  return value;
32 }
33 
34 template <class T>
35 T max(T value1, T value2){
36  if(value1 > value2)
37  return value1;
38  return value2;
39 }
40 
41 template <class T>
42 T min(T value1, T value2){
43  if(value1 < value2)
44  return value1;
45  return value2;
46 }
47 
48 template <class T>
49 T map(T input, T inMin, T inMax, T outMin, T outMax){
50  T output = (input - inMin) * (outMax - outMin) / (inMax - inMin) + outMin;
51  return output;
52 }
53 
58 void commandVectorCallback(const geometry_msgs::Twist::ConstPtr& vel)
59 {
60  //only deals with values pertaining to vertical "vector" drive
61  //vertical value
62  double linearZ = vel->linear.z;
63 
64  double T5 = linearZ*1000;
65  double T6 = linearZ*1000;
66  double T7 = linearZ*1000;
67  double T8 = linearZ*1000;
68 
69  thrustPercents.t1 = T5;
70  thrustPercents.t2 = T6;
71  thrustPercents.t3 = T7;
72  thrustPercents.t4 = T8;
73 
74  //publish message
75  pub.publish(thrustPercents);
76 }
77 
78 int main(int argc, char **argv)
79 {
80 
81  //initialize node for horizontal vector drive
82  ros::init(argc, argv, "vert_drive");
83 
84  ros::NodeHandle n;
85 
86  //ROS publisher to send thruster percent to hardware control node for CAN transmission
87  pub = n.advertise<vector_drive::thrusterPercents>("rov/cmd_vertical_vdrive", 1);
88 
89  //ROS subscriber to get vectors from the joystick control input
90  sub = n.subscribe("rov/cmd_vel", 1, commandVectorCallback);
91 
92 
93  ros::spin();
94 
95  return 0;
96 }
